title: Budget 2022: Ed-tech Sector Hopes 2022 Budget Will Provide Much Needed Boost - NDTV
content: Budget 2022: Ed-tech Sector Hopes 2022 Budget Will Provide Much Needed Boost  NDTV
description: According to a 2021 PwC report, the ed-tech sector is expected to grow at a compounded annual growth rate (CAGR) of 30% to reach a market size of $10.4 billion by 2025.
